alert.note: Alert for Morgan; Washington (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 05 at 4:57PM MDT until August 05 at 5:45PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: The National Weather Service in Denver Colorado has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Morgan County in northeastern Colorado... North central Washington County in northeastern Colorado... * Until 545 PM MDT. * At 457 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Antelope Springs, or 14 miles north of Fort Morgan, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Hillrose, Prewitt Reservoir and Antelope Springs. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
